parameters.name: AddInstanceList
parameters.description: The instances to be added. Ignore this parameter if no instances are to be added.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters.

>  If you do not specify this parameter, the system automatically uses the **request ID** as the **client token**. The **request ID** may be different for each request.

parameters.name: QosDescription
parameters.description: The description of the QoS policy.

parameters.name: QosId
parameters.description: The ID of the QoS policy.

parameters.name: QosName
parameters.description: The name of the QoS policy.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the resource.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: RemoveInstanceList
parameters.description: The instances to be removed. Ignore this parameter if no instances are to be removed.
